name: Near East
description: Dry & crisp with a bracing bitterness and notes of pine, grapefruit, and citrus pith.
story: Near East is one of the first beers we brewed at Working Draft. Named after our location in Madison (we're on the Near East side of town), this beer is straight West Coast!
tasting: Pine, grapefruit, and citrus pith aromas, bracing bitterness
